title: Changeling

fields.name: Backstab:
fields.value: Attack a player using your current Attack Power. If you were in a Hello Neighbor with that player in the last Evening phase, your Attack Power increases by 0.2x

fields.name: Mimicry:
fields.value: Target a player during the Evening phase. If you place above them OR if you place within 10% of them and share a Hello Neighbor, you add them to your Morphing ability.

fields.name: Morphing (Passive):
fields.value: At any time, you may change your body to that of a player you have killed or successfully targeted with Mimicry. You will appear as that player and their role to investigations, your Defense Power will equal that player's, and your Attack Power with either equal theirs or 1.0x, whichever is higher.

fields.name: Slink Away (x1, Passive):
fields.value: The first attack against you during an Evening or Night phase is guaranteed to fail.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Only three or fewer players, including yourself, are alive, and none of them besides you are Neutral Killing.
